contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of June, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following issues:
1. Is the business privilege tax levied by Respondent barred by the Local Tax Enabling Act, 53 Pa.Stat. § 6902(11)?
2. Is the business privilege tax levied by Respondent duplicative of the realty transfer tax imposed upon Petitioner?
